metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v8.11.0 - Three new OpenRouter-backed agents: GLM-5 (code review, 77.8% SWE-bench), Kimi K2.5 (research, 262K context), DeepSeek R1 (visible reasoning traces). Intelligent task routing: review→GLM-5, research→Kimi, security→DeepSeek. 31 personas, 38 commands, 43 skills. Run /octo:setup.
